typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesADLS
MoviesADLS select(mapColumn(
		Movie = movie,
		Title = title,
		Genres = genres,
		Year = year,
		Rating,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAndRename
SelectAndRename filter(toInteger(Year) > 1950) ~> Post1950Movies
Post1950Movies derive(genres = iif(locate('|',Genres) > 1, left(Genres,locate('|',Genres) -1),Genres)) ~> SelectPrimaryGenre
